11.a: They who are during their prayer humbly submissive
11.b: Who pray five time a day
11.c: They who carefully maintain their prayers
11.d: Who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.

11: Who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.
